explanation: [0-0] A large brown bear stands in front of a backdrop of green trees and grass, smiling at the front.

[0-3] First, the big brown bear covers its head with both hands and looks forward. The scene switches to a garden with a fountain. In the center of the fountain is a statue of Cupid, with water flowing from the top of the statue, forming a beautiful waterscape. Red cupcakes float in the pool under the fountain. Around the fountain are lush green grass and trees, as well as blooming pink flowers. In the background, a winding path leads to the woods in the distance. A little boy in blue clothes is on the left, stretching out his right hand at the edge of the fountain, patting the water. A little girl in a yellow dress with short brown hair is holding the head of the statue with both hands, climbing up a bit, sliding down and hanging in mid-air. On the right, a little girl in a yellow dress with short blond hair is riding a yellow tool, flying in and out from the right.
